function: A frontend that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
static_description: The UI displays loading indicators while fetching data from the backend. Components such as search results, booking history, and seat maps dynamically populate after successful API responses.

interaction_and_states.description: On page load, the frontend makes an HTTP GET request to /api/data to retrieve initial application state.

function: A backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database using environment variables
static_description: Backend server initializes a connection pool to PostgreSQL using provided environment variables. All database queries are executed through this pool.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon startup, the backend reads environment variables and establishes a persistent connection to the PostgreSQL instance.

resource_dependency.validation_rules: Username must be unique; Email must be valid format; Passwords must match and meet complexity requirements.

function: User registration functionality with account creation and validation
static_description: Registration form includes fields for username, email, password, and confirm password. Submit button is disabled until all validations pass. Dim gray styling applied throughout.

interaction_and_states.description: As user types into each field, real-time client-side validation checks against predefined rules.
Submits validated form data to /api/auth/register endpoint. Displays success message or error feedback accordingly.

resource_dependency.session_management: JWT-based tokens stored in HttpOnly cookies

function: User login functionality with authentication and session management
static_description: Login form contains email/username and password fields. Snow-themed background with dim gray components.

interaction_and_states.description: Form submits credentials to /api/auth/login. Upon successful authentication, JWT token is issued and stored securely. Redirects to dashboard.

function: Search functionality for bus and railway tickets with filters for date, time, origin, and destination
static_description: Search panel with dropdowns for origin and destination, date/time pickers, and toggle for transport type (bus/railway). Search button initiates query.

interaction_and_states.description: Users select values in dropdowns or input fields to filter available tickets.
Triggers API call to /api/search/tickets with current filter parameters. Results displayed below.

resource_dependency.seat_map_visualization: Interactive SVG grid showing available, booked, and selected seats
resource_dependency.pricing_logic: Dynamic calculation based on route distance and class

function: Real-time display of seat availability and pricing for selected routes
static_description: Seat map visualization shows available (dim gray), reserved (lighter gray), and selected (highlighted) seats. Pricing information updates in real-time beside the map.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a seat toggles its status visually and recalculates total price. Selected seats are highlighted.
Changing route triggers re-fetch of seat availability from /api/seats/availability and refreshes the map.

resource_dependency.payment_gateway_integration: Integration with Stripe or similar PCI-compliant service

function: Secure payment processing integration for ticket purchases
static_description: Payment modal appears when confirming booking. Includes card number, expiry, CVC inputs with dim gray styling. Snow background maintained across modals.

interaction_and_states.description: Submits encrypted payment details to /api/payments/process which interacts with external payment gateway. Shows loading indicator during transaction.

resource_dependency.notification_service: Email/SMS gateway integration (e.g., Twilio or SendGrid)
resource_dependency.confirmation_template: Booking ID, travel details, QR code for ticket

function: Booking confirmation system that sends notifications via email or SMS
static_description: After payment, a confirmation screen displays booking summary including QR code. Notification preferences shown before sending.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon successful payment, backend calls /api/bookings/confirm to generate confirmation and send via configured notification channels.

resource_dependency.past_transaction_schema: Booking ID, date, route, amount, status

function: User dashboard displaying booking history and past transactions
static_description: Dashboard lists previous bookings in reverse chronological order. Each entry includes ID, date, route, amount, and status. Snow background with dim gray cards.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a booking opens detailed view with printable ticket option.

resource_dependency.printable_ticket_template: HTML/CSS formatted printable version of ticket

function: Ticket printing functionality for confirmed bookings
static_description: Each confirmed booking in the dashboard includes a print icon next to the details. Printable ticket preview rendered in browser window.

interaction_and_states.description: Opens a new tab/window with a printer-friendly version of the ticket. Browser’s native print dialog triggered automatically.

function: Responsive design that adapts to both mobile and desktop devices
static_description: Layout adjusts fluidly between breakpoints. Navigation becomes hamburger menu on mobile. Seat selection optimized for touch interfaces.

interaction_and_states.description: UI elements rearrange themselves according to CSS media queries at defined breakpoints.

function: All page backgrounds configured with snow theme
static_description: Every page uses a full-screen snow-themed background image set via CSS body style referencing background_image_path.

resource_dependency.color_palette: #A9A9A9 (dim gray) used consistently for buttons, forms, text, borders, etc.

function: All UI components styled with dim gray color scheme
static_description: All interactive and static UI components use #A9A9A9 as primary color. Consistent styling applied globally through CSS variables or theme file.

function: Repository package.json configured with npm run install:all to install both frontend and backend dependencies
static_description: Root-level package.json defines script 'install:all' that runs concurrent installation commands for frontend and backend directories.

interaction_and_states.description: Executing 'npm run install:all' triggers parallel dependency installations in respective subdirectories.

resource_dependency.package_json_dev_script: { "dev": "concurrently \"npm run dev --prefix frontend\" \"npm run dev --prefix backend\"" }

function: Repository package.json configured with npm run dev to start both frontend and backend concurrently
static_description: Root-level package.json defines script 'dev' that starts development servers for both frontend and backend simultaneously.

interaction_and_states.description: Running 'npm run dev' launches both frontend and backend services concurrently using concurrently package.
